TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 198
TEI.2.document_title: J. W. Gready to Stephen F. Austin, 12-31-1811

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 198

div1.p: Mr Stephen Austin will be so good as to let Madam Hawkins have on of your Chese and oblg,
